description: Detects a suspicious script execution in temporary folders or folders accessible by environment variables
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Script Interpreter Execution From Suspicious Folder
query: (((process.executable.text:("*\\cscript.exe" OR "*\\mshta.exe" OR "*\\wscript.exe")) OR (process.command_line.text:("*\ \-ep\ bypass\ *" OR "*\ \-ExecutionPolicy\ bypass\ *" OR "*\ \-w\ hidden\ *" OR "*\/e\:javascript\ *" OR "*\/e\:Jscript\ *" OR "*\/e\:vbscript\ *")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("cscript.exe" OR "mshta.exe" OR "wscript.exe"))) AND ((process.command_line.text:("*\:\\Perflogs\\*" OR "*\:\\Users\\Public\\*" OR "*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp*" OR "*\\AppData\\Roaming\\Temp*" OR "*\\Temporary\ Internet*" OR "*\\Windows\\Temp*")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*\:\\Users\\*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\\Favorites\\*")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*\:\\Users\\*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\\Favourites\\*")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*\:\\Users\\*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\\Contacts\\*"))))
